heading: # Float
headingText: Applies a custom float across any breakpoint with responsive float utilities.
overviewText1: Float utility classes apply floating based upon the current viewport size using the [CSS float property](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/float).
classesText1: Easily toggle a float with a class:
responsiveText1: Floats can also be applied on a per breakpoint (viewport) basis.
responsiveText2: Here is a list of all the available support classes:
